movie.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
movie.plot: After an accident on a winding road, four teens make the fatal mistake of dumping their victim's body into the sea. But exactly one year later, the dead man returns from his watery grave and he's looking for more than an apology.

events.title: David Egan is murdered, and his killer Ben Willis is hit by a passing car
